        <description>APIs developed to use Localization framework functionalities</description>
        <name>LocalizationFrameworkAPIV2</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LocalizationFrameworkAPIV2 = Class.create();
LocalizationFrameworkAPIV2.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this._lfConstants = new LFConstants();
        this.CSV_FILE_TYPE = this._lfConstants.CSV_FILE_TYPE;
        this.XLIFF_FILE_TYPE = this._lfConstants.XLIFF_FILE_TYPE;
    },

    canRequestTranslations: function(artifactInternalName, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFTranslations().canRequestTranslations(artifactInternalName, additionalInfo);
    },

    requestTranslations: function(artifactInternalName, sysIds, targetLanguages, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFTranslations().requestTranslations(artifactInternalName, sysIds, targetLanguages, additionalInfo);
    },

    requestArtifactTranslations: function(artifactDetails, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFTranslations().requestArtifactTranslations(artifactDetails, additionalInfo);
    },

    getTranslationPreferences: function(artifactInternalName, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFTranslations().getTranslationPreferences(artifactInternalName, additionalInfo);
    },

    getArtifactsTranslationStatus: function(artifactInternalName, artifactSysIds, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFArtifactTranslationStatus().getArtifactsTranslationStatus(artifactInternalName, artifactSysIds, additionalInfo);
    },

    getArtifactsTranslationStatusFromInsights: function(artifactInternalName, artifactSysIds, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFArtifactTranslationStatus().getArtifactsTranslationStatusFromInsights(artifactInternalName, artifactSysIds, additionalInfo);
    },

    getRequestedItemDetails: function(artifactSysIds, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFArtifactTranslationStatus().getRequestedItemDetails(artifactSysIds, additionalInfo);
    },

    machineTranslate: function(artifactInternalName, sysId, targetLanguage, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFMachineTranslator().artifactMachineTranslate(artifactInternalName, sysId, targetLanguage, additionalInfo);
    },

    exportTranslations: function(artifactInternalName, sysId, targetLanguage, additionalInfo) {
        return new LFExportImportTranslator().exportFile(artifactInternalName, sysId, targetLanguage, additionalInfo);
    },

    importTranslations: function(artifactInternalName, sysId, fileContent, fileType, additionalInfo) {
        new LFExportImportTranslator().importFile(artifactInternalName, sysId, fileContent, fileType, additionalInfo);
    },

    hasRequestedItems: function(sysId) {
        return new LFTranslations().hasRequestedItems(sysId);
    },

    getDefaultSourceLanguageDetails: function() {
        return {
            'languageCode': new LFUtils().getDefaultSourceLanguage()
        };
    },

    type: 'LocalizationFrameworkAPIV2'
};]]></script>
